sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-form ref="formRegister" @submit.prevent="login" lazy-validation>
    <v-container>
  <v-container class="grey lighten-5">
    <v-row no-gutters>
      <template v-for="n in 4">
        <v-col :key="n">
          <v-card
            class="pa-2"
            outlined
            tile
          >
            Column
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-responsive
          v-if="n === 2"
          :key="`width-${n}`"
          width="100%"
        ></v-responsive>
      </template>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
        <v-row>
        <v-col>
                <v-text-field
                v-model="username"
                label="UsuÃ¡rio"
                :rules="this.rulesUsername"
                hide-details="auto"
                ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>
        <v-col>
                <v-text-field v-model="password" :rules="this.rulesPassword" label="Senha"></v-text-field>
        </v-col>
        <v-col>
                <v-text-field v-model="first_name" label="Primeiro nome"></v-text-field>
        </v-col>
        <v-col>
                <v-text-field v-model="last_name" label="Ultimo nome"></v-text-field>
        </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>

        <v-col>
            <v-menu
            ref="menu"
            v-model="menu"
            :close-on-content-click="false"
            transition="scale-transition"
            offset-y
            min-width="auto"
            >
            <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                <v-text-field
                v-model="birth_date"
                label="Birthday date"
                prepend-icon="mdi-calendar"
                readonly
                v-bind="attrs"
                v-on="on"
                ></v-text-field>
            </template>
            <v-date-picker
                v-model="birth_date"
                :active-picker.sync="activePicker"
                :max="(new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substr(0, 10)"
                min="1950-01-01"
                @change="save"
            ></v-date-picker>
            </v-menu>
        </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
        <v-col>
            <v-btn
                block
                color="primary"
                elevation="4"
                type="submit"
            >Login</v-btn>
        </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-form>
</template>

<script>


export default {
  name: 'Register',

    data() {
        return {
            username: '',
            password: '',
            first_name:'',
            last_name:'',
            birth_date: null,
            activePicker: null,
            menu: false,
        }
    },
    props: {
        rulesUsername: {type: Array},
        rulesPassword: {type: Array}
    },
    watch: {
      menu (val) {
        val && setTimeout(() => (this.activePicker = 'YEAR'))
      },
    },
    methods: {
        login(){
            console.log("login")
        },
        save (date) {
            this.$refs.menu.save(date)
        },
    },

};
</script>
